attributes.action: call an Election now to put a line under the current negativity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the PM should call an election immediately, to put a line under all the negativity. If he is proud of his work, and secure in the knowledge he is doing the right things, ask the public. 
Do the people think the McBride affair is over? How will a Labour campaign run now? Show us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
